message.raw: Use pipes.quote (quote_str function now depreciated) to shell-escape all commandline arguments. Use extjoin.sep to create job script filename instead of string concat. Job script file permissions are now a bitmask constant (JOB_SCRIPT_FILE_PERMISSIONS) with permissions 0755.

message: Use pipes.quote (quote_str function now depreciated) to shell-escape all commandline arguments. Use extjoin.sep to create job script filename instead of string concat. Job script file permissions are now a bitmask constant (JOB_SCRIPT_FILE_PERMISSIONS) with permissions 0755.
